jsx.motion
Class Linear

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.motion.Motion
          jsx.motion.Interpolator
              jsx.motion.Linear

public final class Linear
extends Interpolator

Defines motions by approximating sample data with the simplest linear interpolation.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org
